routing

类 FloatingContentRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • routing.MessageRouter
      • routing.ActiveRouter
        • routing.FloatingContentRouter

  • public class FloatingContentRouter
extends ActiveRouter
    Replication policy options fifo: do nothing special; replicate in the order in which they are found in the buffer rnd: shuffle randomly saf: smallest anchor zone (area) first svf[2]: smallest cylinder (area x volume) first; svf2 uses area, svf just radius stf[2]: smallest total (area x volume x ttl) first; stf2 uses area, stf just radius

      • FloatingContentRouter

        public FloatingContentRouter(Settings s)
        Constructor. Creates a new message router based on the settings in the given Settings object.
        参数:
        s - The settings object

      • FloatingContentRouter

        protected FloatingContentRouter(FloatingContentRouter r)
        Copyconstructor.
        参数:
        r - The router prototype where setting values are copied from

    • 方法详细资料

      • createNewMessage

        public boolean createNewMessage(Message msg)
        从类复制的说明: MessageRouter
        Creates a new message to the router.
        覆盖:
        createNewMessage 在类中 ActiveRouter
        参数:
        msg - The message to create
        返回:
        True if the creation succeeded, false if not (e.g. the message was too big for the buffer)

      • changedConnection

        public void changedConnection(Connection conn)
        从类复制的说明: ActiveRouter
        Called when a connection's state changes. If energy modeling is enabled, and a new connection is created to this node, reduces the energy for the device discovery (scan response) amount
        覆盖:
        changedConnection 在类中 ActiveRouter
        参数:
        conn - The connection that changed

      • update

        public void update()
        从类复制的说明: ActiveRouter
        Checks out all sending connections to finalize the ready ones and abort those whose connection went down. Also drops messages whose TTL <= 0 (checking every one simulated minute).
        覆盖:
        update 在类中 ActiveRouter
        另请参阅:
        ActiveRouter.addToSendingConnections(Connection)

      • deletion_check

        protected int deletion_check(double h,
                 double r,
                 double a)

      • transferDone

        protected void transferDone(Connection conn)
        从类复制的说明: ActiveRouter
        Method is called just before a transfer is finalized at ActiveRouter.update(). Subclasses that are interested of the event may want to override this.
        覆盖:
        transferDone 在类中 ActiveRouter
        参数:
        conn - The connection whose transfer was finalized

      • replicate

        public FloatingContentRouter replicate()
        从类复制的说明: MessageRouter
        Creates a replicate of this router. The replicate has the same settings as this router but empty buffers and routing tables.
        指定者:
        replicate 在类中 MessageRouter
        返回:
        The replicate

      • messageTransferred

        public Message messageTransferred(java.lang.String id,
                         DTNHost from)
        从类复制的说明: MessageRouter
        This method should be called (on the receiving host) after a message was successfully transferred. The transferred message is put to the message buffer unless this host is the final recipient of the message.
        覆盖:
        messageTransferred 在类中 ActiveRouter
        参数:
        id - Id of the transferred message
        from - Host the message was from (previous hop)
        返回:
        The message that this host received
